text: @ChuckCallesto Sinful? Jan 6, US patient zero is tested, Jan 7, confirmed Covid19, Jan 8, White House learns patient traveled to China. Jan 10, Trump restricts travel to and from certain areas of China. Jan 11, Pelosi berates Trump as racist for doing so. Restrictions used in impeachment trial.
